‛lankawa dan jathyanthara nyaya pathrayata athulu wi hamara bawath, jathyanthara prajawata pitu pa gaman kirimata shri lankawata hakiyawak nathi bawa da, aanduwa dan jathyantharaya samanga sambandha wi kriya kirima aarambha kota athi bawa da, ehidi aanduwa saha wipakshaya ekwi wisandumak athi karagatha yuthu bawada, eyata sahaya dimata thama sudanam bawa da ohu prakasha kota atha.

melesa ghathanayata lakwi aththe nuradhapura wanniyankulam pradeshaye padinchiwa siti 45 hawiridi sujiwa prasanna kumara hettiaarachchi nam thidaru piyeki.
hambanthota, katuwana pradeshaye siduwu wedi thabime siddhiyen miyagiya dedenage dehayan pilibanda awasan katayuthu samakamiwa pawathwiya yuthu bawata adhikarana niyogayak laba di thibe.

"thunsiya wasak thisse balawath adhirajyayan kipayak samaga nonawathi darunu satanaka yedemin,thama prathapawath bhawaya,rana shurathwaya ,jathyanuragaya,aagama bhakthiya ha ekamuthukama lowa hamuwehi pradarshanaya kala abhimanawath kanda udarata wasiyage jathika nidahasa matha patawi athi antha dushitha,dushta,drawida balaya meratin pahakara damime udara wyaparayanta sahaya dime wipaka washayen shri wikrama rajasinha rajuge krura niyogaya pita maradamana lada therun wahanselath,ira nobasina adhirajyaye asama sama yuda balakayanta erehiwa kanda udarata wirodara janathawa awuruddakatath wadi kalayak thisse gena giya prathama sinhala jathika nidahas satane di ,thama gihi sinhala pinwathunta oththu sapayima,aarakshawa salasima,wasiyan unandu kirima,aahara pana awi aayudha saha wiyahiyadam sapaya dima ,jaya patha dewi dewathawun yadima aadi washayen nan ayurin sahabhagi wima hethukota gena marana danduwam paharadim pituwahal kirim aadi anekawidha ninda aparadhayanta goduru karanu labu kanda udarata shreshta buddha puthrayan wahanselage awanka ,akalanka udara aathma parithyagayan udesa karanu labana athyalpa pujopaharayak washayen bhakthi pranama purwakawa unwahanselage shri namayata me potha oppu karanu labe."
